text: On the seventh day it was the turn of the tribal leader of the Ephraimites, Elishama, son of Ammihud.
Solomon made all the articles that were for the house of the LORD: the golden altar; the table on which the showbread lay;
descendants of Lebana, descendants of Hagaba, descendants of Shalmai,
The people rejoiced greatly, and observed that day as a day of much joy.
He said to her, “Your sins are forgiven.”
Have any of the authorities or the Pharisees believed in him?
Yet the Most High does not dwell in houses made by human hands. As the prophet says:
